CPU (ARM Core) :• [[Samsung]] KLM4G1YEMD-B031 4GB - NAND Flash :• ''Fujitsu'' 82MK9A9A 7LFCRAM 1445 962 - FCRAM :• [[Atheros]] AR6014G-AL1C - Wi-Fi SoC :• [[NXP]] S750 1603 TSD438C - Infrared IC ---- *[[Nintendo 3DS New (CTR-002)]] • *'''[[Nintendo 3DS (CTR-001)]]''' • [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Nintendo-3DS-Teardown/5029/ Teardown] • [https://3dbrew.org/wiki/Hardware Hardware] :• CPU: ARM11 MPCore @268MHz, ARM9 @134MHz :• GPU: ''DMP'' PICA200 @268MHz :• Flash: Toshiba THGBM2G3P1FBAI8 1GB :• RAM: ''Fujitsu'' MB82M8080-07L 128MB (2x 64MB) :• Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR6014G-AL1C - Wi-Fi SoC :• FCC ID: EW4DWMW028 (Mitsumi DWM-W028) :• Audio: [[Texas Instruments]] AIC3010B (Codec IC) :• Gyroscope: Invensense ITG-3270 MEMS :• Accelerometer: [[STMicro]] LIS331DH ---- *'''[[Nintendo 2DS (FTR-001)]]''' • *[[Nintendo N3DS (KTR-001)]] *[[Nintendo N3DS XL (RED-001)]] *[[Nintendo N2DS XL (JAN-001)]] ---- *'''[[Nintendo Switch]]''' (HAC-001) (2017) • [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Nintendo+Switch+Teardown/78263 Teardown] :System-on-chip used: '''Nvidia''' Tegra X1 @1.02GHz :CPU: Quad-core Cortex-A57 + Quad-core Cortex-A53 :Memory: 4GB LPDDR4; Storage: 32GB eMMC :Removable storage: microSD/HC/XC (up to 2TB) :Display: 6.2" 1280×720p LCD (237ppi) ::Up to 1080p via HDMI while docked ---- *[[Nintendo Switch Lite]] (HDH-001/002) (2019) {{WPLink|Nintendo_Switch_Lite}} *[[Nintendo Switch OLED]] (HEG-001) (2021) • [https://ru.ifixit.com/News/53272/nintendo-switch-oled-teardown-more-than-screen-deep Teardown] *[[Nintendo Classic Mini]] (CLV-101) (2016) • [http://honeylab.hatenablog.jp/entry/2017/09/28/124623 HoneyLab] :• CPU: [[Allwinner]] R16 (Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7) :• GPU: Mali-400MP2; Flash: Macronix (NAND); RAM: Nanya *[[Nintendo Classic Super]] (EU/AU) - Screen || 3.00" in || 4.18" in || 3.00" in || 3.33" in || 4.18" in || 4.18" in (?) |} * [11] Official Documentation * [5], [10] According to iFixit.com ([http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Nintendo-3DS-Teardown/5029/1#s22696 Teardown]): * Datasheet for memory is for a chip in the same series, it has less :memory than the one inside the 3DS (128MB vs 512MB). * There is a trove of data on the FCC website at [https://fjallfoss.fcc.gov/oetcf/eas/reports/ViewExhibitReport.cfm?mode=Exhibits&RequestTimeout=500&calledFromFrame=N&application_id=462292&fcc_id=%27EW4DWMW028%27 EW4DWMW028]. * [12] This IC is somewhat similar to [http://www.alldatasheet.net/datasheet-pdf/pdf/347838/NXP/SC16IS750IBS.html NXP]. * The Raw ID data for Wi-Fi SPI Flash is from command 0x9F, RDID.
